name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer navigates the criminal underworld with his former student.

name: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne as an ancient enemy rises in the north.

name: The Sopranos
description: A New Jersey mob boss struggles to balance his family life with the responsibilities of leading a criminal organization.

name: The Wire
description: A gripping look at the interconnected lives of police, criminals, and residents in Baltimore.

name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town uncover supernatural mysteries while searching for their missing friend.

name: Sherlock
description: A modern adaptation of the famous detective's adventures with his partner, Dr. Watson.

name: The Office (US)
description: A mockumentary-style sitcom exploring the daily lives of employees at Dunder Mifflin.

name: Friends
description: The hilarious and heartwarming lives of six friends living in New York City.

name: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter navigates the galaxy while protecting a mysterious child.

name: The Crown
description: A biographical story about the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the 20th century.
